cab.content: [This document is the property of His Britannic llajestyrs Government]-.ISO R S f, I. 4135.liU C i B I H 3 2,00-ORDIKAfIOB OF' AILED OPaRArTOI 3 OS IET/SSiSRN FROK:H. Oppy-of telegram received from the French Embassy. Paris, 3 Avril, 1918. 25e pensez-vous pas quril serait bon gaie nos deuxOouvernements demandent a lTItalie sTil lui convientdTadherer au texte de Beauvais ? (Signe:) CL3M3i\TCEAU.2 Thitehall Gardens, 3.17.,April 5th, 1918.
